name: Gold Diggers: The Game
description:
TO THE DEPTHS!

Take control of the Excavator as they descend into the Great Chasm - a dark cavern teeming with riches, adventure, and mortal peril! Bust through dirt and demons as you charge recklessly downwards with your trusty shovel, or proceed cautiously to line your pockets with bountiful loot! But beware the Chasm - for it adapts to intruders!

Will you pursue wealth, fame, or the unknown? Just remember: Gold Diggers don't go back!

Credits

This game was made by our group of 4 over a span of 13 weeks, for our NUS module NM3216: Game Design.

Game Designer: Kimberly J

Asset Designer: Gabriel Lim
(Check out his artwork @ http://galajo.deviantart.com)

Programmer: Nicholas Lam (vnbear)

Producer: Tay Guo Qiang (that's me @ taygq)
